code: var rutValidator=function rutValidator(value){var rutCompleto=value.replace("‐","-");if(!/^[0-9]+[-|‐]{1}[0-9kK]{1}$/.test(rutCompleto)){console.log('formato incorrecto');return false;}var tmp=rutCompleto.split('-');var digv=tmp[1];var rut=tmp[0];if(digv==='K')digv='k';return dv(rut)==digv;};export{rutValidator};var dv=function dv(T){var M=0,S=1;for(;T;T=Math.floor(T/10)){S=(S+T%10*(9-M++%6))%11;}return S?S-1:'k';};var rutFormato=function rutFormato(value){value.replace("‐","-");if(!/^[0-9]+[-|‐]{1}[0-9kK]{1}$/.test(value)){console.log('formato incorrecto');return false;}};export{rutFormato};
